title: Bug Fix: Storage Debouncing Pattern
details:
When adding debouncing to storage.onChanged listeners in PanelContentManager.js:

1. Use `this._storageChangeTimeout` (instance property) instead of local variable
2. Initialize at start of setupEventListeners(): `this._storageChangeTimeout = null;`
3. Clear and set inside listener: `clearTimeout(this._storageChangeTimeout);` then `this._storageChangeTimeout = setTimeout(...)`
4. Clean up in destroy(): `if (this._storageChangeTimeout) { clearTimeout(this._storageChangeTimeout); this._storageChangeTimeout = null; }`
5. Use 50ms debounce period (STORAGE_DEBOUNCE_MS)

Bug fixed: Multiple content script instances in iframes caused listener spam (17 executions per storage write).
